page.title: 13MORE WATER SPORT GOS.SEASCAL
page.content: I stumbled over the pebbles.I eventually got to the salty sea.The tide was quite far out but it was coming in.When we arrived at the canoe trailer we untied the canoes and carried them out to the sea.We sorted out the equipment and then put on the spraydecks and life-jackets.After we set off we paddled towards Drigg.About half-way there we turned back.On the way back the waves got bigger.We were glad to get ashore. There are lots of people who go fishing around here.Alex and I often go fishing,mainly to Holmrook.When we have tackled up we cast into the middle of the river and wait for a bite.I have a telescopic rod and Alex has a two piece rod.For bait we use worms and spinners.I have a new reel called Omi.Alex's reel is a Clipper D.A.M.
